name: Pinball (MGI Edition)
description:
MGI creates a fully functional 1980's pinball arcade machine!

Running in real time 3D through the Unreal Engine. Play a re-creation of what an Retro MGI themed Pinball machine would look, play, and sound like.

Knock down the Star Targets, avoid the Minotaur's Maces, make it through the Ball Zapper and get yourself  Multi-ball Madness for BIG POINTS!!!

Hit the secret UFO flying saucer for a huge POINTS BOOST!

Use a Keyboard or Controller to play.
Use the Pause Options menu to change the color of your pinball, change the cameras position, and adjust the games graphical scalability options to suit your hardware and play style.
